quotes.quote: We're all so desperate to be understood, we forget to be understanding.
Desperation is a necessary ingredient to learning anything, or creating anything. Period. If you ain't desperate at some point, you ain't interesting.
Never underestimate desperate people. You never know how far they will go to get what they want.
Desperate measures call for desperate times.
If you have to beg someone to be in your life, they don't belong there.
People who say they don't care what people think are usually desperate to have people think they don't care what people think.
When people get desperate, they get very creative.
Never allow yourself to be so desperate that you end up settling for far less than what you deserve.
In life you need either inspiration or desperation.
Better be a desperate single with many options than a desperate married with no option.
Don't dare a person who has nothing else left to lose.
To hope means to be ready at every moment for that which is not yet born, and yet not become desperate if there is no birth in our lifetime.
Hope is the power of being cheerful in circumstances that we know to be desperate.
In desperate position, you must fight.
Desperate people lose the thing that makes them human beings. They lose their heart. Anger and hate fill them so that they act like animals.
The more ways we have to connect, the more many of us seem desperate to unplug.
Desperate affairs require desperate measures.
A thing can be true and still be desperate folly.
A person in desperate need of help does not get the support of even one guy often, then wondering from where all these people come together in a big lot for a big cause.
There's always somebody older, richer, more desperate than you.
Why should we be in such desperate haste to succeed, and in such desperate enterprises? If a man does not keep pace with his companions, perhaps it is because he hears a different drummer.
Don't let desperate situations make you do desperate things.
Desperate people can make themselves believe anything.
There are no desperate situations, there are only desperate people.
Desperation is not an evidence of hard work, it's a sign of lack of faith.
A desperate disease requires a dangerous remedy.
There is nothing more dangerous than a desperate man who has nothing to loose.
In your most desperate moments where you crawl on the ground like worms, sometimes you suddenly hear the voice of a savior, the voice of the Music which immediately carries you away to the stars!
It is a characteristic of wisdom not to do desperate things.
You may be desperate, but never let anyone see you as anything less than a cultivated woman.
The more desperate you are, the more mistakes you make.
Hope is believing in something that eludes you. It's a desperate feeling in a desperate situation.
A person, who no matter how desperate the situation, gives others hope, is a true leader.
The interesting thing is why we're so desperate for this anesthetic against loneliness.
When the situation is desperate, it is too late to be serious. Be playful.
To hope means to be ready at every moment for that which is not yet born, and yet not become desperate if there is no birth in our lifetime.
I still believe in the need for guitars and drums and desperate poetry.
Abortion is not a sign that women are free, but a sign that they are desperate.
Faith in the supernatural is a desperate wager made by man at the lowest ebb of his fortunes.
One must always hope when one is desperate, and doubt when one hopes.
It is a characteristic of wisdom not to do desperate things.
Desperate affairs require desperate measures.
Marriage is a desperate thing.
Marriage is a series of desperate arguments people feel passionately about.
In difficult and desperate cases, the boldest counsels are the safest.
Necessity urges desperate measures.
I'm not sure what the future holds but I do know that I'm going to be positive.
Desperate remorse swallows the present in a quenchless rage.
All futurity seems teeming with endless destruction never to be repelled. Desperate remorse swallows the present in a quenchless rage.
O mischief, thou art swift to enter in the thoughts of desperate men!
